thread.title: Delta Says Hack on Vendor Exposed Customer Credit-Card Data

author: Doug Cameron
title: Delta Says Hack on Vendor Exposed Customer Credit-Card Data

organizations.name: delta says hack on vendor exposed customer credit-card data delta air lines inc.

text:
Delta Air Lines Inc. on Thursday said hundreds of thousands of customers could have had their credit-card information compromised in a cyberattack on a vendor that ran a chat function on the carrier’s website.

Delta said [24]/7.ai Inc. informed the airline on March 28 of a malware attack that exposed credit-card data last fall. The chat provider also informed retailer Sears Holdings Inc. of a similar attack that occurred around the same time.
